verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֤ר <WH1696> spake מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> And Moses אֶל־ <WH413> to רָאשֵׁ֣י <WH7218> unto the heads הַמַּטּ֔וֹת <WH4294> of the tribes לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> concerning the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying זֶ֣ה <WH2088> This הַדָּבָ֔ר <WH1697> This [is] the thing אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> hath commanded יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> which the LORD

אִישׁ֩ <WH376> If a man כִּֽי־ <WH3588> If יִדֹּ֨ר <WH5087> vow נֶ֜דֶר <WH5088> a vow לַֽיהוָ֗ה <WH3069> God אֽוֹ־ <WH176> or הִשָּׁ֤בַע <WH7650> or swear שְׁבֻעָה֙ <WH7621> an oath לֶאְסֹ֤ר <WH631> to bind אִסָּר֙ <WH632> with a bond עַל־ <WH5921> and נַפְשׁ֔וֹ <WH5315> his soul לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not יַחֵ֖ל <WH2490> he shall not break דְּבָר֑וֹ <WH1697> his word כְּכָל־ <WH3605> to all הַיֹּצֵ֥א <WH3318> according to all that proceedeth מִפִּ֖יו <WH6310> out of his mouth יַעֲשֶֽׂה׃ <WH6213> he shall do

וְאִשָּׁ֕ה <WH802> If a woman כִּֽי־ <WH3588> if תִדֹּ֥ר <WH5087> also vow נֶ֖דֶר <WH5088> a vow לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> unto the LORD וְאָסְרָ֥ה <WH631> and bind אִסָּ֛ר <WH632> herself by a bond בְּבֵ֥ית <WH1004> house אָבִ֖יהָ <WH1> [being] in her father's בִּנְעֻרֶֽיהָ׃ <WH5271> in her youth

וְשָׁמַ֨ע <WH8085> hear אָבִ֜יהָ <WH1> And her father אֶת־ <WH853> נִדְרָ֗הּ <WH5088> her vow וֶֽאֱסָרָהּ֙ <WH632> and her bond אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which אָֽסְרָ֣ה <WH631> wherewith she hath bound עַל־ <WH5921> and נַפְשָׁ֔הּ <WH5315> her soul וְהֶחֱרִ֥ישׁ <WH2790> shall hold his peace לָ֖הּ אָבִ֑יהָ <WH1> and her father וְקָ֙מוּ֙ <WH6965> shall stand כָּל־ <WH3605> all נְדָרֶ֔יהָ <WH5088> at her then all her vows וְכָל־ <WH3605> and every אִסָּ֛ר <WH632> and every bond אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which אָסְרָ֥ה <WH631> wherewith she hath bound עַל־ <WH5921> and נַפְשָׁ֖הּ <WH5315> her soul יָקֽוּם׃ <WH6965> shall stand

וְאִם־ <WH518> if הֵנִ֨יא <WH5106> disallow אָבִ֣יהָ <WH1> But if her father אֹתָהּ֮ <WH853> בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> her in the day שָׁמְעוֹ֒ <WH8085> that he heareth כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner נְדָרֶ֗יהָ <WH5088> not any of her vows וֶֽאֱסָרֶ֛יהָ <WH632> or of her bonds אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which אָסְרָ֥ה <WH631> wherewith she hath bound עַל־ <WH5921> and נַפְשָׁ֖הּ <WH5315> her soul לֹ֣א <WH3808> not יָק֑וּם <WH6965> shall stand וַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> and the LORD יִֽסְלַח־ <WH5545> shall forgive לָ֔הּ כִּי־ <WH3588> her because הֵנִ֥יא <WH5106> disallowed אָבִ֖יהָ <WH1> her because her father אֹתָֽהּ׃ <WH853>

וְאִם־ <WH518> if הָי֤וֹ <WH1961> become תִֽהְיֶה֙ <WH1961> become לְאִ֔ישׁ <WH376> And if she had at all an husband וּנְדָרֶ֖יהָ <WH5088> when she vowed עָלֶ֑יהָ <WH5921> under א֚וֹ <WH176> or מִבְטָ֣א <WH4008> or uttered שְׂפָתֶ֔יהָ <WH8193> ought out of her lips אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which אָסְרָ֖ה <WH631> wherewith she bound עַל־ <WH5921> under נַפְשָֽׁהּ׃ <WH5315> her soul

וְשָׁמַ֥ע <WH8085> heard אִישָׁ֛הּ <WH376> And her husband בְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> at her in the day שָׁמְע֖וֹ <WH8085> that he heard וְהֶחֱרִ֣ישׁ <WH2790> [it] and held his peace לָ֑הּ וְקָ֣מוּ <WH6965> shall stand נְדָרֶ֗יהָ <WH5088> [it] then her vows וֶֽאֱסָרֶ֛הָ <WH632> and her bonds אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which אָסְרָ֥ה <WH631> wherewith she bound עַל־ <WH5921> and נַפְשָׁ֖הּ <WH5315> her soul יָקֻֽמוּ׃ <WH6965> shall stand

וְ֠אִם <WH518> if בְּי֨וֹם <WH3117> her on the day שְׁמֹ֣עַ <WH8085> that he heard אִישָׁהּ֮ <WH376> But if her husband יָנִ֣יא <WH5106> disallowed אוֹתָהּ֒ <WH853> וְהֵפֵ֗ר <WH6565> of none effect אֶת־ <WH853> נִדְרָהּ֙ <WH5088> [it] then he shall make her vow which she vowed אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עָלֶ֔יהָ <WH5921> is under וְאֵת֙ <WH853> מִבְטָ֣א <WH4008> and that which she uttered שְׂפָתֶ֔יהָ <WH8193> with her lips אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which אָסְרָ֖ה <WH631> wherewith she bound עַל־ <WH5921> is under נַפְשָׁ֑הּ <WH5315> her soul וַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> and the LORD יִֽסְלַֽח־ <WH5545> shall forgive לָֽהּ׃

וְנֵ֥דֶר <WH5088> But every vow אַלְמָנָ֖ה <WH490> of a widow וּגְרוּשָׁ֑ה <WH1644> and of her that is divorced כֹּ֛ל <WH3605> everything אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which אָסְרָ֥ה <WH631> wherewith they have bound עַל־ <WH5921> against נַפְשָׁ֖הּ <WH5315> their souls יָק֥וּם <WH6965> shall stand עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <WH5921> against

וְאִם־ <WH518> if בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> house אִישָׁ֖הּ <WH376> in her husband's נָדָ֑רָה <WH5087> And if she vowed אֽוֹ־ <WH176> or אָסְרָ֥ה <WH631> or bound אִסָּ֛ר <WH632> by a bond עַל־ <WH5921> and נַפְשָׁ֖הּ <WH5315> her soul בִּשְׁבֻעָֽה׃ <WH7621> with an oath

וְשָׁמַ֤ע <WH8085> heard אִישָׁהּ֙ <WH376> And her husband וְהֶחֱרִ֣שׁ <WH2790> [it] and held his peace לָ֔הּ לֹ֥א <WH3808> not הֵנִ֖יא <WH5106> at her [and] disallowed אֹתָ֑הּ <WH853> וְקָ֙מוּ֙ <WH6965> shall stand כָּל־ <WH3605> all נְדָרֶ֔יהָ <WH5088> her not then all her vows וְכָל־ <WH3605> and every אִסָּ֛ר <WH632> and every bond אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which אָסְרָ֥ה <WH631> wherewith she bound עַל־ <WH5921> and נַפְשָׁ֖הּ <WH5315> her soul יָקֽוּם׃ <WH6965> shall stand

וְאִם־ <WH518> if הָפֵר֩ <WH6565> hath utterly יָפֵ֨ר <WH6565> made them void אֹתָ֥ם ׀ <WH853> אִישָׁהּ֮ <WH376> But if her husband בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> on the day שָׁמְעוֹ֒ <WH8085> he heard כָּל־ <WH3605> whatever מוֹצָ֨א <WH4161> [them then] whatsoever proceeded שְׂפָתֶ֧יהָ <WH8193> out of her lips לִנְדָרֶ֛יהָ <WH5088> concerning her vows וּלְאִסַּ֥ר <WH632> or concerning the bond נַפְשָׁ֖הּ <WH5315> of her soul לֹ֣א <WH3808> shall not יָק֑וּם <WH6965> shall not stand אִישָׁ֣הּ <WH376> her husband הֲפֵרָ֔ם <WH6565> hath made them void וַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> and the LORD יִֽסְלַֽח־ <WH5545> shall forgive לָֽהּ׃

כָּל־ <WH3605> Every נֵ֛דֶר <WH5088> Every vow וְכָל־ <WH3605> and every שְׁבֻעַ֥ת <WH7621> oath אִסָּ֖ר <WH632> and every binding לְעַנֹּ֣ת <WH6031> to afflict נָ֑פֶשׁ <WH5315> the soul אִישָׁ֥הּ <WH376> her husband יְקִימֶ֖נּוּ <WH6965> may establish וְאִישָׁ֥הּ <WH376> it or her husband יְפֵרֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH6565> may make it void

וְאִם־ <WH518> if הַחֲרֵשׁ֩ <WH2790> altogether יַחֲרִ֨ישׁ <WH2790> hold his peace לָ֥הּ אִישָׁהּ֮ <WH376> But if her husband מִיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> at her from day אֶל־ <WH413> to יוֹם֒ <WH3117> to day וְהֵקִים֙ <WH6965> then he establisheth אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all נְדָרֶ֔יהָ <WH5088> all her vows א֥וֹ <WH176> or אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֱסָרֶ֖יהָ <WH632> or all her bonds אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עָלֶ֑יהָ <WH5921> her he הֵקִ֣ים <WH6965> which [are] upon her he confirmeth אֹתָ֔ם <WH853> כִּי־ <WH3588> because הֶחֱרִ֥שׁ <WH2790> them because he held his peace לָ֖הּ בְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> at her in the day שָׁמְעֽוֹ׃ <WH8085> that he heard

וְאִם־ <WH518> if הָפֵ֥ר <WH6565> But if he shall any ways יָפֵ֛ר <WH6565> make them void אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> after שָׁמְע֑וֹ <WH8085> that he hath heard וְנָשָׂ֖א <WH5375> [them] then he shall bear אֶת־ <WH853> עֲוֹנָֽהּ׃ <WH5771> her iniquity

אֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> These הַֽחֻקִּ֗ים <WH2706> These [are] the statutes אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which צִוָּ֤ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> which the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> Moses בֵּ֥ין <WH996> between אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> between a man לְאִשְׁתּ֑וֹ <WH802> and his wife בֵּֽין־ <WH996> between אָ֣ב <WH1> between the father לְבִתּ֔וֹ <WH1323> and his daughter בִּנְעֻרֶ֖יהָ <WH5271> [being yet] in her youth בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> house אָבִֽיהָ׃ <WH1> in her father's פ
